Healthy Food

Goal 2. Healthy Food, No Hunger - balance repo

Food Nutrition Labels (YAML locally)

In the "fdc" subfolder we have two yaml samples for each of the 5 food groups (protein, dairy, vegetable, fruit, grains)

Protein
CHICKEN THIGH
CHEDDAR CHEESE

Dairy
MILK
SPINACH

Vegetable
TOFU
Lettuce, raw

Fruit
APPLE
CHERRY

Grains
SPAGHETTI
RICE
